column4: Hi guy I'm trying to install ubunto 7.04 for the first time. I've got a TTY error, could someone help me?
Where can i ask for help?
I restarted the computer with the cd
Enter 'help' for a list of built-in commands.
read the message from ubotu  you need to join #ubuntu+1
for 7.10 you need to join the #ubuntu+1 channel
you just said earlier you were trying to install 7.10
well check the cd for defects and try burning it at a slower speed
You need to check the cd for errors
and you need to join #ubuntu+1 for gutsy
did you try burning it at a slower speed?
if you get tot he menu then you can check the cd
its like the third option down
